title: Sporting goods industry : Revenue of Easton Bell Sports 2013
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue (in million U.S. dollars), containing a total of 8 data points.
In general Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) has rose over the Year.

Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) is gradually increasing from 2006 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
The highest Revenue (in million U.S. dollars), of value 834.9 was reached at Year 2011
Minimum Revenue (in million U.S. dollars) about 639.0 was reached at Year 2006
